Pointless Adding API Reference¶

Simple Adding (pointless_adding)¶

Demonstration package with nonsensical function to practise debugging capabilities in Visual Studio Code.

The submodules of pointless_adding are:

Submodules¶

objects

Objects (pointless_adding.objects)

adders

Adders (pointless_adding.adders)
